column1: back of a length on off stump, tapped off the back foot to point. Tentatively sees the first ball off
short on middle, but going down the leg side. Got big on the batsman as he tried to pull, but too far away from him. Misses by a feet, and sharply taken by the keeper
good length on middle stump, cramps Wade for room as he drops his hands on this one. They take off for the quick single, and it's a direct hit from midwicket. But Wade's safely in
yorker on off stump, squeezed away with the bat's open face to third man
good length outside off, and angling away after pitching, pokes at it but the pace makes him miss that tentative jab. Flies off the surface as well. Terrific delivery
good length outside off, pushes at it uppishly, but takes a thick outside edge. Falls short of the man at third man
overpitched on middle stump, almost a yorker to end the over. Dug back to Johnson
good length wide outside off, slapped off the back foot square, but intercepted by Klinger at cover point. Sticks his hand out and stops the ball from going past him
good length outside off, but too much width on offer. Cut off the back foot, and finds the gap this time. Beats point, and there's no stopping that ball thereafter
full pitched on middle, and that's smacked! First six of the innings. Lifted over mid on, and falls just beyond the long-on boundary

short and wide once again, and punished once more! Third boundary in a row. Stays deep in his crease, and slaps firmly off the back foot. The square umpire does well to dance his way out of the ball's way

improvised! Good length outside off, and Wade walks across to the off side to attempt the paddle. Flicks this over to deep midwicket, and Bresnan's getting under it, but it's dropped in the deep as he races back towards the ropes. Bounces away into the boundary ropes after the misfield
short outside off, and cut uppishly over point. Clears the infield and four more to end the over! Twenty two runs off the second over
short and wide outside off, angling further away from Short. Left alone

full on middle and leg, tries to clip this behind square towards the leg side, but misses. Raps him on the pads and runs down to third man. Impact was in front of leg, and would've gone down the leg side
full on middle stump, driven off his toes past mid on's left, forces the chase from the infielder
how did that miss the stumps?! Almost played on. Good length on off stump, tries to chop this to third man, but takes the inside edge. Lobs over the stumps and lands safely
good length on middle stump, but once again drifting down the leg side
back of a length just outside off, gets big on Short. Defended off the back foot
and there's Short's first boundary! Full outside off, and crunched off the front foot. Driven extremely well, as it beats cover
pressure on Kelly. Short outside leg, and going straight through past the batsman's leg side

good length on leg stump, swivels and pulls over short fine leg! Flies just over the diving fielder, but enough muscle to clear the infield. Great effort from Johnson inside the circle, but Wade had just enough power to beat him
good length on middle stump, angling slightly away from him, cut square but straight to point
good length on off stump, punched off the back foot to cover point. Two dot balls
good length on leg stump, tries to whip this fine down the leg side but misses. Hits his thigh pad instead, but they race off for a run anyway
big shout for lbw! Full ball raps him on the pads, but pitched outside leg. Impact, however, may have been in front of leg stump
another big appeal, but inside edge this time! Full on middle stump, tries to drive but misses due to the inswing. Lucky for him, that took an inside edge off his bat

good length on middle stump, tries to whip this off his pads behind square, but straight to the man at short fine leg. Not a well-directed shot, and it's comfortably taken. A useful cameo comes to an end
short and wide outside off, angling further away and cut furiously off the back foot. Lifted over point, and he starts off with a boundary
full on middle stump, shapes into Bailey cramping the captain. Mistimed flick trickles away
good length on middle stump, turned off his hips to short fine leg
good length outside off, misses the back-foot punch. Probably beaten for pace. Flies past his outside edge to the keeper
good length on middle, angling into the left hander, turned off his hips to midwicket for a quick run
full on off stump, slapped off the front foot and beats cover! No chance for Voges, who attempts a chase
full on middle stump, slogged in front of square, but straight to short midwicket. No direction found
good length on middle stump, tries to slog this over mid on, but the bat turns in his hand! Lobs into mid on's hands
back of a length outside off, chopped off the back foot to point
good length outside off, angles into the right-hander, cut once more but off the top half of the bat. Trickles away to point
full on off stump, firmly driven square but straight to cover. Five dots from Kelly to end the over
full on off stump, hit to cover off the front foot. Good reaction-stop from the fielder
good length on off stump, tries to drive straight, but comes off the bat's top half. Falls just shot of Agar
good length on off stump, comes down the ground, but can only tap this back to Agar
good length outside off, backs away and cuts late, but the fielder at point dives to his right and stops. Nine dot balls now
good length outside off, attempts the cut shot once more, but the fielder at point is sharp as ever. Slides around and stops this again

good length on middle stump, hits his pad's roll and trickles away to the keeper on the bounce. Bailey has no clue where the ball is, and he looks to take a single, notices Bancroft and turns back into the crease just in time. Agar starts off with a maiden
good length outside off, takes the pace off the ball. Muscled down the ground, past the non-striker, to long on
full outside off, and enough width for Bailey to free his arms. Hits a crunching drive, and beats wide mid off. Beautiful sound off the bat
good length on middle stump, walks across to the off side and gets inside the line of the ball. Turned off his toes to midwicket
short outside off, but another slower ball. Drags this from over his head towards deep midwicket
good length wide outside off, attempts to punch this towards cover off the back foot, takes the inside edge to short midwicket instead
full outside off, smacked off the front foot standing tall. Beats cover, and will beat the man in the deep as well!
good length on off stump, angling into Bailey. Backs away and muscles this to cover point
back of a length on off stump, hit down the ground off the back foot to long off. First run off Agar
full and loopy outside off, grip off the surface turning away from the right-hander. Tapped to cover
full outside off, tries to drive away from his body but the inside edge ricochets onto his pads
overpitched on middle stump, attempts a sweep but played too fine. Straight to the man at short fine leg
good length outside off, tapped down the ground past Agar. The bowler attempts to stop it on his follow through, but can only get fingertips to it
good length on off stump, angling into McDermott. Clipped off his hips to midwicket. No run on offer
short on off stump, pulled powerfully to deep backward square. Cartwright's positioned there though
good length on off stump, flicked off his hips fine down the leg side. Goes to fine leg
good length full outside off, driven firmly, but straight to mid off
slower ball short outside off, drags his pull along the carpet to midwicket. They scamper across for the run
good length on off stump, knocked away off the back foot to midwicket, but they choose not to take the single
good length outside off, and grip and turn away from McDermott. He's stranded after coming down the wicket. Bancroft has all the time in the world to break the stumps. Deserved wicket for the spinner
full on middle stump, hit firmly past the diving mid-off fielder
good length outside off, rocks back and cuts behind square. Beats point
cramped, and played on! Good length on off stump, Christian walked across too much to the off side. No room to cut this, and inside edge crashes into off stump
short outside off, zips straight through, gets behind the line of the ball and punches off the back foot to deep extra cover
full on middle stump, hit straight back to the non-striker, but Agar, sharp as ever, dives to his right and stops the ball from going past him
full on middle and leg, clipped off his toes to the fine-leg fielder who is standing slightly square
overpitched on middle and leg once more, turned off his toes with soft hands to deep midwicket
crunched! Full outside off, and firmly driven off the front foot. Well played, threading the gap between cover and mid off
good length outside off, tapped down the ground, but stopped by Bresnan on his follow through
short on off stump, but with no real pace on it. Drags the ball towards square leg. Simply helps it on its way to deep backward square
good length outside off, punched off the back foot to Bresnan once more
good length on off stump, walks across to the off side and tries to sweep. Top edged! But falls just beyond short fine leg. Chase for the man, who parries this back
good length outside off, stays deep in his crease and punches to Voges at cover
full outside off, another attempted sweep that does not come off. No contact off the pad and raps his pads, but impact was outside the stumps
overpitched on middle stump, another attempted sweep that's hit well, but straight once again to short fine leg
smacked! Full on middle, and that's slog-swept over Bresnan's head at deep backward square. Oof
low full toss on middle stump, hit to Johnson at long off. No real timing off that shot. Agar finishes with 4-1-14-2
full on middle stump, turned off his hips with soft hands to deep midwicket. They want the second, but it's not to be
short on middle and leg, it's a wayward line, and it's punished! Pulled along the ground, and despite it taking a bottom edge, the ball beats fine leg for a boundary
good length on middle stump, walks across to the off side and whips this behind square once more. Work for Cartwright at deep midwicket
full outside off, slower ball (112 kph) this time. Driven to long on off the front foot
full on leg stump with the batsman backing away. Kelly followed him, though. Driven inside out to cover
yorker, and direct hit! Pitches on middle, and dug away to midwicket. They race off for a tentative single, but it's hit the stumps on the full! Looks close for Milenko, but he's made his ground
good length on middle stump, punched off the back foot to cover. Man there
short on middle stump and it's pulled with some power! Off the meat of the bat, and that lands 103m away. Into the stands at deep midwicket. We need a new ball.
full ball on off stump, dug back to the bowler
full on middle stump, tries to slog this over cow corner, but inside edge onto his pads. No run
full outside off, carved over cover off the front foot. Work for the man at deep extra cover
full on off stump, smashed down the ground to long off

good length on leg stump, but the batsman was expecting that line. Backs away towards the leg side, and muscles this over deep midwicket! Full swivel of the body to play this behind square. Another maximum from Milenko!
yorker on leg stump that the batsman converts into a low full toss, smacked down the ground to long on
slower ball on leg stump, Bailey tries to flick this towards fine leg but misses completely. Misses leg stump by just a little as Bailey walks across to the off side
another slower ball, pulled with soft hands to fine leg
waist-high full toss, and that's been hit high! Doesn't have the distance, and pocketed easily by deep midwicket. But he's safe! It's a no ball
short on middle stump, and muscled over the non-striker's head! Firmly struck, and beats long off as well. Makes good use of the free hit
overpitched on off stump, drags his drive to wide long on
full toss on off stump, and that's banged! Gets under the ball and lifts this over Voges at long off. Ends the over with a maximum
full and wide outside off, almost a yorker outside the stumps. Dug away to cover point. They scamper across for the run
full outside off, and that's carved off the back foot. Flies over backward point, and beats Cartwright at deep point. More runs from Milenko. Goes into his 40s
very full and very wide outside off, tries to carve this square but misses the shot
full and wide outside off once again, slapped square but straight to the man at point. Forcing the batsman to reach at it
full outside off, opens the bat's face and slices this over point. It's going to beat third man as well. Milking this attack, Milenko
full just outside off, too close to off stump for Milenko to glance fine. Misses the shot, an attempted glance down to third man

you miss, I hit! Low full toss on middle stump, Bailey tries to walk across the off side and atttempt the lap sweep, but he misses. Beaten by the pace, and the ball crashes into the base of middle and leg. Bailey has to go
full on middle stump, dug this to fine leg. Hurries the batsman, with the extra pace
low full toss on middle stump, almost a yorker. Milenko can only play this straight. Hit to long off
full outside off, Archer comes down the ground to try and ping this past cover, but the ball flies past his outside edge. Just shy of the top of off stump as well
full on off stump, bunted down the ground to long off. Not timed well, but well enough to beat the bowler
low full toss on middle and off, muscled past the non-striker to long on. Milenko keeps strike
overpitched full on middle stump, driven to long off. Not hit well enough, allowing them to turn for the second
full and wide outside off, and Milenko does the mistake of going across too much to the leg side. Too far for him to attempt to play. Wild swing of the bat, but misses

full outside off, and that's pumped over the bowler's head! Well struck, and that's a six to the long-on boundary! What a way to get to your fifty. Lands in the base of electronic display near the boundary
full and wide outside off, tries to cut square but takes the toe end of the bat. Squirted away behind point, and beats third man running across
full outside off stump, tries to drive but takes the inside edge through to the keeper
full outside off, big wind up from the batsman, but he misses completely. Great end to the over from Johnson
full on off stump, hit firmly past the non-striker to long on. Gets the set batsman back on strike
full on middle stump, turned off his toes to deep midwicket. Loud and early call for the second run, and it's easily completed
full outside off, backs away and tries to carve this inside out. Takes a thick outside edge and flies over short third man! Lucky, but the batsman will take it
full outside leg stump, but he noticed Milenko backing away. Cramps him for room, forcing the batsman to miss the straight drive. Through to the keeper
full on leg stump, tries to whip towards deep backward square, but takes his right boot instead. Goes between his legs, and beats the diving keeper too. Legbyes
full on middle stump, squeezed away to deep midwicket and Hurricanes end on 167 for 5
full outside off, slapped off the front foot to point. Misfield allows him to get off the mark
full on middle stump, tapped off the pads towards midwicket. They race off for the run
good length on off stump, angling further away. Attempts an extravagant drive, but doesn't connect. Through to the keeper
full outside off, driven uppishly over cover, but takes a thick outside edge. It's in the air, and Short does very well to run behind from point and complete a sliding catch
full on middle stump, tapped off the front foot to mid on. No single on offer
full on off stump, punched to mid off, and they're off for the quick run. Direct hit at the striker's end from the fielder, but Bancroft is safe
back of a length on middle stump, turned off his hips to deep midwicket for only a single
full on leg stump, worked off his toes to the man at deep midwicket once again
full on off stump, hit back to Rose off the front foot
full on middle, tapped to cover with soft hands for a quick run
short on middle stump, flicked off his hips to deep midwicket
full on off stump, walks down the ground and turns this to cow corner off the front foot. Beats midwicket, allowing them to take off for the single
back of a length outside off, worked off the back foot to midwicket. They walk across for the single
short and wide outside off, crunching cut off the back foot. Beats cover point, and races away thereafter
back of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot. Bancroft wants a quick single, but Klinger isn't interested
full outside off, and that's smacked! Lifted over mid off's head. Such a clean hit. Couple of bounces and into the long-off boundary
good length on middle stump, misses the flick towards the leg side. The ball goes towards point instead, allowing them to sneak through for the run
short on off stump, and that's firmly pulled off the back foot. Hit well, and beats midwicket. Deep backward square can't intercept either
full on off stump, turned off his toes to square leg with soft hands
good length just outside off, tapped down the ground to long on
back of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to mid off. Early call from Klinger for the run
full on middle stump, comes down the wicket and hits this straight over mid off. Still head while playing the shot, and it's sent into the second row
full on off stump, driven down the ground past the non-striker to long on
good length on middle stump, worked off his hips to deep midwicket to see the over out

appeal for caught behind! Wade was interested, but Archer isn't. Back of a length on off stump, jags back and goes between bat and pad through to Wade. There was a noise from somewhere, but it's tough to determine from where
short on off stump, gets big on Klinger, tapped with soft hands towards cover
short on off stump, and the ball soars over Bancroft's head. The crowd's not happy. They thought it was a wide
back of a length on off stump, drags his pull square towards midwicket
back of a length outside off, tries to cut square but misses. Extra bounce forces the error from the batsman

short on off stump, and the ball zips off after pitching. Klinger's forced to go onto his back foot, and his defense is down the wrong line. Takes the inside edge, onto his helmet, but the ball falls on the top of off stump. He's bowled!
yorker on middle stump. A toe crusher. The batsman's on all fours as he digs this to midwicket
good length outside off, tries to pull but the extra bounce beats Bancroft. Hits his shoulder instead
big appeal for lbw! Good length on middle stump, tries to flick off his pads but misses. Impact was on middle stump, but hit him too high
good length outside off, bunted over mid off's head, and races away thereafter! Archer gives it a futile chase. Not off the middle of the bat though
full outside off, another straight drive over the bowler's head. This time it's hit slightly more on the leg side. Crashes into the long-on boundary.
full on off stump, tries to drive this straight but ricocheted onto his body. They scamper across anyway
short on middle stump, soars over the batsman's head. Starts off with an extra
back of a length outside off, tries to punch this square but takes a thick outside edge. Flies past the keeper's right, and beats the diving third-man fielder
full outside off, driven to mid off for a quick run
slow yorker outside off stump, squeezed to cover off the front foot. Good change of pace, released from the back of his hand
back of a length outside off, tries to cut but misses the shot completely. Through to Wade
back of a length outside off, slower ball once again. Cartwright gets off the mark by opening his bat's face and running this ball down to third man. Also the team fifty
good length outside off, another slower ball to end the over. Tapped to point for a run
full on middle stump, turned off his toes to deep midwicket for a walking single
back of a length on middle stump, rocks back and punches down the ground back to the bowler
full on off stump, hit straight to long off off the front foot
full on middle stump, turned off his toes to deep backward square after coming down the ground
back of a length on off stump, rocks back and pulls over the fielder at midwicket. Work for the man in the deep, but he can't pull this back. Made his ground, but failed to parry it in
Full toss on off stump, and Cartwright bunts it straight down the ground! Crashes straight into the sightscreen on the full
full on middle stump, tapped to to wide long on with soft hands, and that's a double
full on middle stump, turned off his toes to deep midwicket
full on middle an off, worked off his toes to deep backward square
short on middle stump, turns further away from the right-hander, dragged off the back foot to cow corner
good length on off stump, and going straight through. Bowled like a medium pacer
good length on leg stump, spins down the leg side. The keeper can't grab onto it either, allowing them to steal the single
back of a length on off stump, tries to cut but misses the shot. Takes the keeper's glove through to short third man
back of a length outside off, comes off the back off the hand, tapped to the bowler
back of a length slower ball once again, pitches on off stump, punched off the back foot to mid off
good length and quick on middle stump, tapped with soft hands towards point, as they scamper across for the single
another slower ball, on a good length outside off. Turned off his hips to midwicket
slow, short and wide outside off. Sticks his bat out and pokes this ball to deep point
back of a length outside off, rocks back and tries to cut. Misses the shot, probably because the angling ball was too close to his body
good length on middle stump, pulled with some power behind square. Terrific work from Short at deep backward
yorker on middle stump, and that's bowled! Cartwright came down the ground, and the ball slid under his bat. A leg-cutter from Christian, and it earns the Hurricanes a crucial wicket
full on middle stump, turned off his toes to deep midwicket off the front foot
full outside of, another slower ball. Muscled back to Christian, who does well to stick his hand out and stop this ball
full on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long on
slower ball to end the over, good length outside off, sticks his bat out and runs this down to point
good length ball skididng low into the pads, clipped in front of deep midwicket with soft hands
length ball on leg stump again, steps out this time and dabs it with soft hands to steal another two at midwicket
enough of the delicate. Steps out again and meets the length ball at the pitch outside leg stump. Lifts it cleanly over deep midwicket
length on off stump, steps out and is beaten by flight as he looks o go through the off side. Gets an inside edge and it's two more in the vacant leg side
floated up on middle stump, met on the full and thumped over the bowler's head
back of a length slider on middle stump, pushed to long-on off the back foot
short of a length on middle stump and deflected into the square leg region as he misses out on the pull
short one on middle stump, pulled to deep square
back of a length and in at leg stump. Cramped as he looks to dab it to third man, but it ends up there off the thigh guard anyway

short of a length on leg stump, backs away and swipes to try and go over deep midwicket. Miscues and gets it high to deep square's left. The fielder there runs in a long way and puts in a dive, but can't catch that
bouncer on off stump, swings and misses. That was marginally above the head and the crowd aren't happy as the replay is shown
clears midwicket. Short ball sits up for him outside off and he swings clean from under it to lift this over the fielder
good length on middle stump, turned off his hips to midwicket for a quick single
good length outside off, slapped from over his shoulder, and the ball flies over backward point! Beats the man at third man
soft dismissal! Slower ball on middle stump, through his pull too early, and the top edge lobs through to Wade. Sharp catch from the keeper, after being forced to dive forward
back of a length outside off, extra pace off the surface, tries to cut but the ball goes over his blade. Soft appeal for caught-behind from both Wade and Mills, but the umpire isn't interested
back of a length outside off, cut with hard hands. Flies away to third man
slower ball, on a good length outside off. Turner walked across to the off side, and tapped back to Mills
good length on middle stump, turned off his hips behind square to deep backward square
good length outside off, angling into the right hander, tries to punch but takes the inside edge towards midwicket instead
good length on middle stump, going down the leg side through to Wade. Swing on offer again
good length on middle stump, tries to flick off his pads but misses the shot. Trickles down to fine leg
full outside off, and crunched off the front foot. Divine shot, beats the man at cover, and races away after that. Full follow through in that drive
short outside off, tries to ramp this over the keeper's head but misses. Wade appeals for the caught-behind, but nope. Not a wide, either
short on middle, legcutter, pulled off the back foot, but not with much power. Lands short of deep midwicket
slower ball that's a wide and low full toss, drags his shot behind square to deep backward. Mistimed shot

short outside off, and pulled in front of square to cow corner. They turn around for the second run, but Archer's throw from the deep cannons into the stumps! Direct hit at the far end. Voges is out by a few feet. Archer finds the bullseye
slower ball outside off, dipping onto Agar, turned with soft hands to midwicket
short on middle stump, unconvincingly pulled off the top half of the bat. Falls short of fine leg, who comes charging in
full on off stump, driven down the ground, but hit too straight. Crashes into the non-striker's stumps, allowing the batsmen to steal a single
low full toss on middle and leg, flicked off his toes behind square. Beats fine leg. Four to start the over
slower ball but very wide outside off, goes over the tramlines but the umpire thinks it's alright. Agar was through his shot too early
yorker on off stump, tries to slog this square but takes the inside edge onto his boots. Trickles away towards the leg side, allowing them to take the run
yorker on leg stump, turned off his toes to fine leg. They want the quick second, and the throw is flat, but Turner makes it in just in time
good length on middle stump, drags his pull along the ground to deep midwicket
full outside off, and in the slot to be slogged. Hit hard down the ground, but long on's there
full on leg stump, tries to flick square but takes a leading edge off his bat. Trickles away to midwicket
low full toss on off stump, get his front foot out of the way and lifts this inside out over cover. Just about beats the infielder, but the fielder can't drag it back
low full toss on off stump, hit over mid off. Not enough power behind that shot, means it'll fall short of long off
full on middle stump, can only muscle this down the ground to long on
good length on off stump, stays deep and opens the bat's face past point, soft hands allow them to take the double
full on off stump, bunted straight back to Archer, who sticks his hand out and stops the ball
yorker outside leg stump, saw the batsman make room on the leg side. Squeezed back to Christian
full on leg stump, almost a yorker. Flicked off his toes once again to deep backward square. Turner turns for the second
full on leg stump, once again cramped Turner's toes. Dug back past Christian's right
full on middle stump, tries to squeeze this towards the leg side but the ball takes the inside edge through to his pads. Appeal for lbw, but bat first, says the umpire
full on leg stump, and that's smacked! Falls short of Bailey and Archer at cow corner. The captain did well to parry it back, but his last touch came from beyond the ropes. Crunch boundary, there
full on middle stump, and it's a low full toss! Dispatched! Flies over the long-on boundary! Such sweet connection off the bat. Front foot out of the way, and smacked with all the muscle he possesses
full toss on middle stump, smacked to mid off, but not off the middle of the bat. Quick single on offer, and they take it. Direct hit at the non-striker's, but Agar's dive saved him

full on off stump, walks across to the off side and paddles this over the keeper's head. Clinical stuff, as th ball lands just inside the fine-leg boundary. Turner reaches his fifty and Scorchers win by five wickets
